name: AMRYT PHARMA
sampleDescriptions: Patient access to medicines, Innovation (FDA), Pricing and Reimbursement
The FDA user fee reauthorization, and issues related to rare disease innovation including the HEART ACT (HR 7667) and the BENEFIT Act (HR4472).
